get.description: Fetch country, province, district, or locality based on selection

parameters.name: parent_id
parameters.description: ID of the selected level (except for 'country')

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of items per page (for pagination)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit number of records (alternative to pagination)

get.description: Fetch detailed information of a college by its ID, including galleries, courses, facilities, reviews, and related news events.

description.example: A prestigious college offering various courses.

meta_description.example: ABC College is a top-ranked institution.

get.description: Fetch details of a specific News Event by its ID.
Fetch and compare details of multiple colleges based on their IDs.
Retrieve available courses, universities, types of colleges, durations, and organizations based on filters.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of counselor referrals

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific course by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the course to retrieve

get.description: Retrieve a list of courses with optional pagination parameters.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of items per page (for pagination)

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of items to skip (used with limit)

get.summary: Get a list of home page data

post.summary: Store a review for an organization
post.description: Create a review for an organization. It checks for existing reviews from the same user for the same organization.

organization_id.description: ID of the organization being reviewed

409.description: Review already exists from this user for the same organization

message.example: A review from this user for this organization already exists!

get.summary: Get a list of header and footer menu items
get.description: Get a list of menu items for the header and footer of the website.
Fetch a paginated list of news events. Supports pagination and offset-based fetching.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of items per page (used for pagination)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items to retrieve (used for offset-based fetching)

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of items to skip (used with limit)

description.example: This is a detailed description of the news event.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of counselor Source
Search for courses, universities, and organizations
Search for Colleges, Courses, and Universities
get.description: This endpoint allows you to perform a simple search across colleges, courses, and universities. You can filter results by keyword, course ID, and university ID. The results are paginated for better performance.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Keyword to search for across college, course, and university names. It searches both title and short title.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Specify the search type. This field defaults to 'simple' if not provided.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of items per page for paginated results. Defaults to 10.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Current page number for pagination. Defaults to 1.

parameters.name: course
parameters.description: Filter by specific course ID to narrow down search results to a particular course.

parameters.name: university
parameters.description: Filter by specific university ID to narrow down search results to a particular university.

get.description: Retrieve the details of a university by its ID.
Retrieve a list of universities, with options for pagination.

Bearer.description: JWT Bearer Authentication - Enter token in format (Bearer <your-token>)
